鵵字的基本解释

鵵
tù
古书上说的猫头鹰一类的鸟。

鵵字的汉语字典释义

[①]［tù］
［《廣韻》湯故切，去暮，透。］
一种鸱鸮科鸟。

鵵字的康熙字典解释

【亥集中】【鳥字部】　鵵； 康熙笔画：19； 页码：页1492第18
【廣韻】湯故切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】土故切，?音兔。鵵，木鵵鳥，有毛角，夜飛，好食雞。【爾雅·釋鳥】鶹鵵軌。一曰木兔。又【爾雅·釋鳥】雈老鵵。【註】木兔似鴟鵂而小。又【玉篇】大胡切，音徒。義同。

鵵字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
鵵字的起名意思

暂无。

鵵
Basic explanation of words
鵵
tù
Birds like owls said in ancient books.
鵵
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［tù］
["Guangyun" Tang Gu cuts, goes to dusk, through. ]
A kind of owl.
鵵
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Hai Collection] [Bird Character Department] 　鵵; Kangxi Strokes: 19; Page Number: Page 1492 Page 18
[Guang Yun] Tang Gu cut [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] [Zheng Yun] Soil Gu cut, sound rabbit. The 鵵, the wood 鵵 bird, has hairy horns, flies at night, and eats chickens well. 【Erya·Shiniao】Buzzard orbit. One is the wooden rabbit. Also 【Erya·Shiniao】Niao Lao Yuan. [Note] The wooden rabbit is like an owl but small. Also [Jade articles] Da Huqie, a sound disciple. The same meaning.
鵵

鵵
Name meaning
Nothing.
tù
только в сочетаниях; см. 老鵵
